This is like asking a librarian to "find a book" without specifying *any* details—they’d have to hand you the entire library. 😅

If you’re certain you have **zero details**, the only option is to abort the search. But if you can recall *even one tiny clue* (e.g., "it was sent after lunch" or "to my mom"), I can help narrow it down! Let me know.
